rows.label: tlk70000068_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm not a clever guy, so I'm not used to
all this introspection business. I asked
Nittle-san what he thought, but, well...

rows.label: tlk70000068_05_msg0002
rows.name:
He just told me to get back to work.
I'm not sure if he's stricter than my
dad, but he sure is bossy.

rows.label: tlk70000068_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Anyway, Nittle-san and Chairman
Morumo are talking about making
special roads for emergencies...

rows.label: tlk70000068_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I can't just wait around for people like
you to come and rescue me. I need to
make my own way in the world.

rows.label: tlk70000068_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I can't be you guys, but I can try to
help fill in the gaps! After all, you guys
can't be everywhere at once.
